title: Virtual Laboratory-Based Science Principle Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Operated in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, utilizing a virtual laboratory integrated with a Moodle-based online learning management system

learning_goals: Students can accurately simulate core experiments in physics and chemistry (e.g., acid-base neutralization reactions, law of conservation of momentum) through virtual laboratories with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can interpret computer simulation results to write scientific data analysis reports.
It enhances scientific communication skills by verbally explaining interactions between variables that occur during experiments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
